publicwhip.spmotion: S3M-4553 Charlie Gordon: Congratulations to the Evening Times Community Champions of South East Glasgow—That the Parliament congratulates the organisations and individuals whose voluntary and professional work for the communities of south east Glasgow have been recognised in the Evening Times Community Champions Awards, including the late Charles Boyce of Mount Florida Community Council (Individual Award), Castlemilk Pensioners’ Action Centre (Team Award), Cath Chrisite (Public Service Individual Award), Castlemilk High School teaching and support staff (Public Service Team Award), Alison Drummond (Neighbour Award) and Mount Florida Primary School primary seven (Young Community Champion Award). Supported by: Kenneth Gibson, Ken Macintosh, Trish Godman, Jamie McGrigor, Sandra White, Aileen Campbell, James Kelly*
S3M-4553 Congratulations to the Evening Times Community Champions of South East Glasgow (lodged on 1 July 2009) Jackie Baillie*, Pauline McNeill*
S3M-4553 Congratulations to the Evening Times Community Champions of South East Glasgow (lodged on 1 July 2009) Des McNulty*, Mr Frank McAveety*
